paragraphs.content: Behold, I will reveal unto you the Priesthood, by the hand of Elijah the prophet, before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the Lord.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Behold, I will reveal unto you the Priesthood, by the hand of Elijah the prophet, before the coming of the great and dreadful day of the Lord.

paragraphs.content: And he shall plant in the hearts of the children the promises made to the fathers, and the hearts of the children shall turn to their fathers.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he shall plant in the hearts of the children the promises made to the fathers, and the hearts of the children shall turn to their fathers.

paragraphs.content: If it were not so, the whole earth would be utterly wasted at his coming.
paragraphs.contentHtml: If it were not so, the whole earth would be utterly wasted at his coming.
